title: Amb Trellat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A restaurant/live event venue serving tea, green smoothies, cocktails and a mainly vegetarian menu. Has several vegan choices such as a large variety of vegan pates (avocado and beans, carrot, eggplant, beet, or hummus) all served with different types of ecological bread, in addition to some casseroles, salads and crepes.
